text:

"Such is always fortune."

or maybe:

"Fortune is always as such."

name: zem
text: Chewbacca ate with relish the inner organs of beasts and fowls. He liked thick giblet soup, nutty gizzards, a stuffed roast heart, liver slices fried with crustcrumbs, fried hencod's roes. Most of all he liked grilled mutton kidneys which gave to his palate a fine tang of faintly scented urine.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Why....that's simply offal!

text: Roast Beef with shoe polish on his head is pretty much two of my ex boyfriends.

text:
That's a good excuse, and a good rule, for onomatopeia.

I'm not sure if I spelled that correctly...

text: hence him trying to hold it in.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Dammit, I looked again and you made me do it again! I hate this!

text: when i first read this i thought he barfed because he thrusted his martini glass into his mouth

name: rotating-dog
text:
Why did you think of that though
Why would you think of that

name: silver_lake
text: At first I was like whaaaat come on man but then when you look at the sequence the martini glass seems to be headed that way. Interesting. I didn't think it until you said it though -- I still believe Ray just threw up naturally, from seeing his friend as goth. I think he set his martini glass down, the way he normally does when he throws up.

name: darkwaffle
text: This premise is so perfect.

name: morganization
text: ray tries so hard to keep the barf in

name: eric
text: I too often find myself expectorating my breakfast (which often finds purchase on my bedside table courtesy of the queen herself) when goth children look at me in the mall.

name: deancain29
text: I enjoy Ray's angry face.

name: killerlimpet
text: It's about time Onstad cashed in on the motif of harmful sensation

name: taiiga
text: A comment left by taiiga was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tekende, Art-Vader, sonicbiology, lastlarf)

name: higuma
text: Hmm, I'm not sure that Chris realistically captured the physics involved with that mirror.  Unless that is a painting of Beef that Ray commissioned in a hurry?

name: professorhazard
text: Indeed, viewed from the angle we are standing at, the mirror should just show a reversal of Beef. What Onstad has done here is how people should look when they are on TV.

name: professorhazard
text: Which is no surprise, since it is probable that Ray has some kind of Sharper Image digital LCD mirror that works via cameras and screens instead of simple reflection technology.

name: robanhk
text: http://www.foxnews.com/story/0,2933,292271,00.html

name: drskradley
text: That's really, really messed up. I'd rather have a taser up my ass anyday, thanks. Okay, not any day. And not up my ass.

name: echidnaboy
text: Cripes. It's like the "sick-sticks" from Minority Report . Man, the only thing better than a weapon that makes people puke would be one which makes people shit their pants. Seriously, no-one would mess with you.

name: cagliostro
text: Paging someone with a Transmet avicon! xiaomimi, anyone, get over here!

text: which you already said on the page where milk was discussed i should be sleeping i gotta go to work in 3 hours

text: I have no memories of milk discussion, but yep, that'sa-me.

text:
The one where Little Nephew said to Ray that when he was young people didn't know they could eat eggs, which led to a long thread of Weird Things People Put In Their Digestive Systems, and one guy mentioned milk and booze was also proposed.

Aww fuck, I'm using the Internet again!

text:
Hey I'm from SA in Texas! CRAZY!

Texas is okay, retracting ones love of Texas is a harsh thing to do.

text: For some reason, whenever I hear people ask "University of TN?" in response to hearing "UT", it always sounds like an accusation. This is probably because I live in Nashville.

text: I don't laugh out loud at many strips, but those last two panels got me!  One of my favourites.

name: littlefatdog
text: Couldn't help but bust out laughing here at the library at Ray trying to keep a straight face while vomit spurts out the corners of his mouth. Usual props go to Onstad's comic timing and consistent ability to have amazing punchline panels without any dialogue.
